subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN3179 is on the way
description_text:
Bonjour,

Pourrais-je avoir des nouvelles sur l'expédition du frein à main ?

Merci


Hello, Could I get an update on the handbrake shipment? Thank you

conversations.body_text:
Hello,

I can't follow your link because I need a password to log in, and your 
website isn't sending it to me.
This is the third time I've requested a password reset link, and I 
haven't received anything in my email inbox (not even in my spam folder).
I was able to see, with the link of my order, that the delivery tracking 
has updated.

I look forward to receiving my order.

Sincerely,

Pierre SOWINSKI

Le 20/11/2025 à 10:29, service@simsonn.com a écrit :
>
>
>         Hi Pierre SOWINSKI
>
> We would like to acknowledge that we have received your request and a 
> ticket has been created.
> A support representative will be reviewing your request and will send 
> you a personal response.(usually within 24 hours).
>
> To view the status of the ticket or add comments, please visit
> https://simsonn.freshdesk.com/helpdesk/tickets/6411?follow=email
>
> Thank you for your patience.
>
